title: Developer User Mapping Configuration
description: Maps user IDs between production and development Clerk instances for data synchronization

developers.description: List of developer accounts to sync between environments

productionUserId.description: User ID from production Clerk instance (starts with 'user_')

developmentUserId.description: User ID from development Clerk instance (starts with 'user_')

description.description: Optional description for this developer account

conflictResolution.description: How to resolve conflicts when same page is modified in both environments

syncDeleted.description: Whether to sync deleted pages between environments
